title: My Recent Projects
subtitle: Here are some projects that I have worked on recently.

projects.title: Users
projects.description: User list, where each user contains tasks, using the JSONPlaceholder API

projects.title: Pokemons
projects.description: App that lists 5 pokemon and in each one you can see its detail, using the PokeApi API

projects.title: Heros marvel

projects.title: Movies

projects.title: Rick and Morty
projects.description: App that lists all the rick and morty characters with infinite scroll, it also has dark mode
